property.name: Dangling branch
property.description: The range of acceptable distance for the first point of a dendrite/axon to be from the center of the soma.

property.name: Z-jump
property.description: The range of acceptable distance in Z between 2 adjacent points.

property.name: Narrow start
property.description: The range of acceptable values for the ratio (second_section_diameter / first_section_diameter), most likely [0, 1]. This ensures the second section always has a smaller diameter than the first section.

property.name: Fat end
property.description: The range of acceptable values for the ratio (last_section_diameter / average_section_diameter), most likely [0, 1]. This ensures the last section is not larger than the average.

property.name: Number of children
property.description: The range of acceptable number of children for a given node or point. Most likely [0, 3].

property.name: Diameter change
property.description: The range of acceptable percentage of diameter change for contiguous nodes. Most likely 30%, so in the range of [0, 30]

property.name: Minimum value
property.description: The minimum value of the range.

property.name: Maximum value
property.description: The maximum value of the range.
